SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 NO, TST_BOARD_REPLY_NO, TST_BOARD_NO, TST_USER_NICKNAME, TST_BOARD_REPLY_CONTENT, DATE_FORMAT(TST_BOARD_REPLY_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS TST_BOARD_REPLY_DATE
FROM TST_BOARD_REPLY, (SELECT @rownum:=0) r
WHERE TST_BOARD_REPLY_DEFLAG = 'N'
AND TST_BOARD_NO = #{tst_board_no}
ORDER BY NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TST_BOARD_REPLY (TST_BOARD_NO, TST_USER_NICKNAME, TST_BOARD_REPLY_CONTENT, TST_BOARD_REPLY_DATE) VALUES (#{tst_board_no}, #{tst_user_nickname}, #{tst_board_reply_content}, NOW())
